titles: Archy's dream, sometimes iester to His Majestie, but exiled the court by Canterburies malice with a relation for whom an odd chaire stood voide in hell.
author: Armstrong, Archie, d. 1672.
notes: Attributed to Archibald Armstrong. Cf. BLC.
Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
keywords: Fools and jesters --  England --  Early works to 1800.
